oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Aerial of the Vanderbilt University campus area, Nashville, Tennessee, 1961 January 03
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An aerial photograph of the Vanderbilt University campus in Nashville, Tennessee. Also pictured: the Vanderbilt Stadium at Dudley Field, the Veterans Administration Hospital building located at Twenty-fourth Avenue 2 and Garland, campus buildings, as well as the surrounding neighborhood. Nashville’s Centennial Park, at 2500 West End Avenue, and its centerpiece the Parthenon is also pictured. Forms part of Record Group 412, Photographs Collection. 1 photographic negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Vanderbilt University--History--Sources; Parthenon (Art museum : Nashville, Tenn.)
